translations: [医] 粘膜炎；[内科] 卡他

sentences.sentence: I still suffer from catarrh and sinus problems.
sentences.translation: 我仍然患有黏膜炎和鼻窦炎。

sentences.sentence: He was suffering from nasal catarrh.
Marx died of complications from a catarrh that he developed in 1881.
sentences.translation: 马克思1881年死于结膜炎引起的并发症。
